title: [RESOLVED] Spectator Issues - 2016/10/26
body:
Hi all,

We're aware of issues that are currently preventing players from spectating games correctly. We're currently investigating the issue.

Zaps

**UPDATES:**

_**2016-10-27 7:00AM AEST**_

We've found and resolved the issue that was causing these errors. Please let us know if you're still having issues when trying to spectate games!

replies.body: Ty, know I can go back to making youtube vids.
